snippet: The restaurant operator said on Monday it had filed a lawsuit against three companies in China saying that their social media accounts had spread false claims about its food.
abstract: KFC says it has filed lawsuit against Chinese companies Shanxi Weilukuang Technology, Taiyuan Zero Point Technology and Yingchenanzhi Success and Culture Communication, accusing them of spreading false claims about KFC's food on social media accounts.
lead_paragraph: The restaurant operator said on Monday it had filed a lawsuit against three companies in China saying that their social media accounts had spread false claims about its food.

headline.main: KFC Sues Over Claims of Birds With 8 Legs
headline.print_headline: KFC Sues Over Claims of Birds With 8 Legs
